message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.GR, cs.RO 

This paper deals with deep learning architecture for 3D semantic segmentation of unstructured point clouds. The paper introduces grouping techniques to define point neighborhoods in the initial world space and the learned feature space, which is a common approach in computer vision (cs.CV) and machine learning (cs.LG). The paper also incorporates dedicated loss functions to structure the learned point feature space, which is a common approach in artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The task of 3D semantic segmentation of point clouds is related to graphics (cs.GR) and robotics (cs.RO) as it involves understanding the 3D environment. Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-categories for this paper are cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.GR, and cs.RO, in that order.
